entry.title: YashRajput09/BlogBreez: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
entry.content: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

entry.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.
entry.content: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.

entry.title: pandeyAmit4/js-toast-notifier: ToastfierJS is a lightweight JavaScript library for customizable toast notifications, supporting dynamic positioning, themes, and notification types with icons—ideal for clean, dependency-free alerts in any web app.
entry.content: ToastfierJS is a lightweight JavaScript library for customizable toast notifications, supporting dynamic positioning, themes, and notification types with icons—ideal for clean, dependency-free alerts in any web app.

entry.title: orchidjs/tom-select: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.
entry.content: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.

entry.title: Burhanverse/rssify: A lightweight telegram bot powered by NodeJS™, that helps you stay updated by delivering content from your favorite RSS feeds directly to your group chat or in private. Customize, organize, and manage your RSS subscriptions effortlessly!
